data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Khimki's Ilya Kukharchuk misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 4, Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow's Nikolay Komlichenko is on target but unsuccessful.
Sebastian Szymanski (Dinamo Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 8, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Ivan Ordets (Dinamo Moscow) strikes at Arena Khimki but his header is cleared.
Khimki pushes forward through Vladimir Dyadyun, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 9, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Islambek Kuat (Khimki) has received a yellow card from Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
At Arena Khimki, Dinamo Moscow are penalized for being offside.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Alesandr Lomovitskiy.
In the minute 21, Clinton N'Jie for the away team is judged to be offside.
Sergei Ivanov blows against Dinamo Moscow's Clinton N'Jie for offside.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Khimki's Dmitri Tikhiy breaks free at Arena Khimki. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 25, Sergei Ivanov signals a Khimki throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Arena Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Khimki's half.
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Khimki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Dinamo Moscow drives forward and Sebastian Szymanski gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 32, Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Khimki, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dinamo Moscow are pushing forward but Dmitri Skopintsev's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Khimki have a goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Dinamo Moscow push forward at Arena Khimki and Nikola Moro gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Khimki defence.
In the minute 35, Daniil Lesovoy of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Sergei Ivanov awards Khimki a goal kick.
Nikola Moro of Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roman Evgeniev is booked for the away team.
In the minute 43, Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
At Arena Khimki, Daniil Fomin has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Dinamo Moscow attack but Nikolay Komlichenko's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov blows to end the first-half.
Sergei Ivanov has blown to start the second-half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
In the minute 46, Kirill Novikov is making the team's first substitution at Arena Khimki with Vyacheslav Grulev replacing Clinton N'Jie.
Mihail Tikhonov is on a sub for Islambek Kuat for Khimki.
In the minute 47, Nikolay Komlichenko (Dinamo Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 48, Sergei Ivanov signals a Khimki throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
Sergei Ivanov awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Lesovoy gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 52, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Dinamo Moscow are whistled for offside.
In Khimki Khimki drive forward through Kirill Bozhenov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 53, Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Khimki have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 56, Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daniil Fomin for Dinamo Moscow drives towards goal at Arena Khimki. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Daniil Fomin (Dinamo Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 57, Dinamo Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ilya Kukharchuk (Khimki) has received a first yellow card.
Can Dinamo Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Dinamo Moscow drive upfield and Nikola Moro gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Khimki defender.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Mihail Tikhonov of Khimki gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
Dinamo Moscow will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Khimki.
In the minute 64, Dmitri Skopintsev for Dinamo Moscow has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and receives a first yellow card.
Mihail Tikhonov (Khimki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow just outside Khimki's area.
In the minute 66, Khimki's Egor Danilkin has been booked in Khimki.
Dinamo Moscow's Sebastian Szymanski misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Free kick Khimki.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
In the minute 70, Kirill Novikov (Dinamo Moscow) is making a second substitution, with Konstantin Rausch replacing Dmitri Skopintsev.
The away team have replaced Nikolay Komlichenko with Sylvester Igboun. This is the third substitution made today by Kirill Novikov.
In the minute 71, Nikola Moro for Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 72, Roman Evgeniev (Dinamo Moscow) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Sergei Ivanov awards Khimki a goal kick.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 75, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Arena Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 77, Igor Shkolik is replacing Nikola Moro for Dinamo Moscow at Arena Khimki.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team has substituted Vladimir Dyadyun with Mohamed Konate. Igor Cherevchenko is thus making his second change.
In the minute 79, Igor Cherevchenko is making the team's third substitution at Arena Khimki with Danil Lipovoy replacing Alesandr Lomovitskiy.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 81, Can Khimki capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Attention is being given to Khimki’s Ilya Lantratov and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 83, Ilya Lantratov returns to the field for Khimki after picking up a slight injury.
Khimki have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 84, Khimki have a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Dinamo Moscow!
Brian Idowu for Khimki has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Daniil Fomin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 88, Sylvester Igboun's header is off-target for Dinamo Moscow.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, In Khimki Dinamo Moscow attack through Sylvester Igboun. The finish is off target, however.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
At Arena Khimki the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sylvester Igboun (Dinamo Moscow) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Khimki defenders.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sergei Ivanov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Dmitri Tikhiy (Khimki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
